'''Crimson Finch''' is a type of bird that can be found in the wild.
==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|1}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Crimson finches can be found east of [[Mondstadt]] teleporter and north of [[Stormbearer Point]] near the edge of the cliff.
<gallery>
Wildlife Crimson Finch Map Location 1.png
Wildlife Crimson Finch Map Location 2.png
</gallery>

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=279 Official Interactive Map] for specific locations.
